nodes.description: 2014年10月，库班尼被ISIS围困引发土耳其东南部骚乱
nodes.support_text: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan claimed he was not prepared to launch operations against ISIL unless it was also against the forces of Bashar Al Assad.

nodes.description: 2014年1月，库班尼被YPG收复，ISIS承诺报复
nodes.support_text: Kobanî was retaken from ISIL forces in late January 2015, with the Kurdish People's Protection Units (YPG) taking full control of the city.

nodes.description: 2015年6月，土耳其与约旦威胁入侵叙利亚，允许美国使用基地
nodes.support_text: During late June and early July 2015, the Turkish and Jordanian governments made threats to invade Syria and set up buffer zones.

nodes.description: 2015年7月20日，苏鲁奇爆炸事件导致33人死亡、104人受伤
nodes.support_text: The Suruç bombing took place in the Suruç district of Şanlıurfa Province in Turkey at approximately 12:00 local time on 20 July 2015...

nodes.description: 2015年7月21日，ISIS宣称对苏鲁奇爆炸负责
nodes.support_text: The next day, ISIL (the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant) claimed responsibility for the attack.

nodes.description: 2015年7月24日，土耳其与ISIS在基利斯交火，启动空袭行动
nodes.support_text: This led to Turkey launching Operation Martyr Yalçın, a series of airstrikes against mostly Kurdish militant positions in Northern Iraq and Syria.

nodes.description: 2015年7月26日，Ceylanpınar两名警察遭PKK报复杀害
nodes.support_text: The PKK blamed the Turkish government for the attack, saying the government is conspiring with ISIL. This anger of the PKK contributed to PKK revenge attacks (see section Aftermath).

nodes.description: 2015年7月20日苏鲁奇爆炸事件导致104人受伤并被报告
nodes.support_text: The Suruç bombing took place in the Suruç district of Şanlıurfa Province in Turkey at approximately 12:00 local time on 20 July 2015, resulting in 33 deaths and 104 injuries.

nodes.description: 空袭导致土耳其与ISIL冲突升级
nodes.support_text: 空袭导致土耳其与ISIL冲突升级

nodes.description: 大规模行动开始打击PKK等目标
至少一名警察被确认隶属于反恐特勤队
PKK声称对Suruç地区的事件负责

edges.support_text: Kobanî was retaken from ISIL forces in late January 2015, with the Kurdish People's Protection Units (YPG) taking full control of the city.
During late June and early July 2015, the Turkish and Jordanian governments made threats to invade Syria and set up buffer zones.
The next day, ISIL (the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant) claimed responsibility for the attack.
爆炸事件发生后报告受伤情况
爆炸事件发生后学生发表声明
Suruç爆炸事件发生后，PKK声称对此负责
This led to Turkey launching Operation Martyr Yalçın, a series of airstrikes against mostly Kurdish militant positions in Northern Iraq and Syria.
The PKK blamed the Turkish government for the attack, saying the government is conspiring with ISIL. This anger of the PKK contributed to PKK revenge attacks (see section Aftermath).
